casebody.data:
TUPPER CORPORATION, Plaintiff, Appellant, v. TILTON & COOK CO., Defendant, Appellee. No. 4772. United States Court of Appeals First Circuit. Jan. 28, 1954.

Before MAGRUDER, Chief Judge, and WOODBURY and HARTIGAN, Circuit Judges.

Alexander Mencher, New York City, Seder & Seder, Worcester, Mass., on brief, for appellant. Melvin R. Jenney, Boston, Mass., Ken-way, Jenney, Witter & Hildreth, Boston, Mass., on brief, for appellee. PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from is affirmed upon the opinion of the District Court, 113 F.Supp. 805.
